features: ELEGANT AESTHETIC: With a compact style and finish, this desk micro soundbar sits easily on a monitor base, or beside a laptop or desktop.Waterproof : No
LED LIGHTS: MS-Teams app status, call / hang-up, volume up, volume down, and mic mute / unmute are all clearly indicated by LED indicators
FULL DUPLEX AUDIO: With AI noise cancellation, numerous people can speak at the same time, while still being heard clearly in a business conference
ENHANCED CONNECTIVITY: With an intuitive set up process, connect the speakerphone to monitors, laptops, or desktops through the USB-A or USB-C port
MS TEAMS BUTTON: Provides quick access to meetings and notifications -- the perfect multimedia speaker for business conferences and a home office
body.description: The Dell SP3022 Speakerphone is the most intelligent Microsoft Teams-certified speakerphone in the world. The clever cable management feature on this USB Compact Computer Multimedia Speaker keeps your workstation clean. Whether you're conferencing or listening to music, AI Noise and Echo Cancellation technology delivers clear lows and highs with no distortion. Reduces background noise while maintaining human voice clarity.

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.1 4.1 out of 5 stars 86 ratings 4.1 out of 5 stars

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Personalize your workday Quickly join meetings: Easily navigate through your work with the ability to quickly access meetings and notifications using a dedicated MS Teams button on the Dell's most intelligent Microsoft Teams-certified speakerphone. Tailored to your needs: Configure your speakerphone’s audio by using the Dell Peripheral Manager’s simple-to-use settings.

Integrate seamlessly into your workflow Multiple connectivity options: Connect the speakerphone to monitors, laptops and desktops through the USB-A and USB-C ports. Stay organized: Keep your workspace neat with built in cable-storage. Elegant look: Complement your Dell display with the speakerphone's matching design and finish.
Product Dimensions 1. Height: 58.3 mm (2.29") | 2. Length: 226 mm (8.89") | 3. Width: 71 mm (2.79")

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for conference calls in the office
reviews.reviewText: I am typically a headphones person when it comes to Teams or other types of conference calls, however I recently went from a more open office situation where it was headphones or bust to a more traditional office where I can take calls out loud. The reason for my purchase is that I did not like the quality of the speakers on my laptop and wanted the sound to come from the monitor with the people on it (setup is laptop and two monitors and I put my meetings on one of the monitors).This device solved for my issue very nicely. The sound quality for conference calls is excellent. It is probably fine for office volume music as well, though I have not used it for this. I am able to hear and be heard from any where in my fairly large office space. Furthermore, the design of the device itself is thoughtful, with touch sensitive buttons on the front and the ability to wrap and hide any extra cord. Speaking of cords, there is only one USB C cable which provides power and audio (there is a built in USB A adapter if needed). I didn't think I would use it, but it turns out I like the mute button on the device over using my keyboard or mouse. The Teams button is not super useful, but I get it. When you get a noti that you have a call coming in or a meeting starting, you can push it and it will bring up the join call screen and make it your active window. It gets more useful as you get used to it, and it was a wonky experience at first. Obviously, I recommend this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great speaker for work
reviews.reviewText: I work at home and my day is 70% Teams Meetings. This speaker is perfect! It cancels background noise and is crystal clear. Great purchase!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Perfect solution for monitors without speaker bar attachment
reviews.reviewText: This speaker is much smaller than expected when in hand, but it works plenty well enough for business use in a fairly loud setting. It is clear and easy to access volume buttons on front.It sits nicely on a stand up desk between dual monitors and does a great job for Teams calls.Perfect for online video or website audio, but not a speaker I would use for enjoying music at any real volume.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great speaker for conference calls and music in a small office.
reviews.reviewText: This is great speaker for conference calls, especially MS Teams. The audio quality for calls is great and have no complaints from people on the other end of the call. The MS Teams buttons make it simple to use for volume, mute and end call control.For listening to music, it is adequate. For it's size it sounds pretty good, but the bass is a bit weak. For background music it is just fine.The simple USB connection is very nice. No extra power cord, no worrying about charging or over-charging batteries, no messing with BT. One simple connection and simple controls. The USB A or USB C connection basically means it will connect to anything.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Mac Users Beware
reviews.reviewText: I have this speaker running on a Mac Studio. There is a problem where it doesn't allow Teams to join any calls, removed the device and Teams worked well. Also, after waking the computer from sleep with this speaker plugged in videos would not play and the volume controls didn't work.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for Teams
reviews.reviewText: I needed a speaker for my telework. I use Teams as one of my main tools. I had purchased the Microsoft Teams ready speaker thinking it would be my best option. I set it up and it worked fine but when I reconnected my Dell work laptop after needing to take it somewhere, it didn't work right (volume control wasn't right, etc.). So I went ahead and spent more money to buy this one and it has worked like a charm. The sound is better and it responds just as it should. I wish I would have just bought this one to begin with.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Nice looking speaker and sounds good but messes with teams
reviews.reviewText: My speaker stopped working after 1 week. May have just been a bad unit as Dell makes good stuff. The noise cancellation is pretty good but you have to adjust your settings in teams, zoom and Skype or you will get some artifacts from the microphone. The buttons are really sensitive and need to be careful as I accidentally bumped it and it disconnected a call. It's a good speaker but for 80 there are more affordable options. It also has no Bluetooth which would be nice to pair with my phone

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: works really well with my Dell Computer

This product is so easy to set up and works great! Just plug into your USB or USB-C, change your input/output settings and done!Sound quality is perfect for meetings and not too bad for music. You can download the DELL Peripheral Manager to affect a couple more settings like Bass/Mid/Treble, turn on/off the noise cancellation function, and update firmware.Really happy with this purchase
me gusto mucho, para las video conferencias funciona como la gran mayoria, pero el plus es para musica tambien suena muy bien si se nota que tiene bajos, el material se siente duraradero,

I can use them as speaker, microphone and it supports Ms Teams and Zoom. They got teams, call, speaker volume up/down, and microphone mute button. The item came from US Amazon in 4 days at cheaper price.
Lots of issues and comments related to my voice quality on headphones. This solved all my problems. The noise cancelation is great too, gets rid of most of my pet sounds.
Me encantó, es genial para las reuniones de tema, los botones en la bocina son muy útiles. Sólo me gustaría que fuera inálambrica, pero de ahí en fuera, perfecta.
